scripts.deploy:s3-demo: node setup aws-s3-static-website && cd ../source/use_cases/aws-s3-static-website && npx mira deploy s3-static-website --file=lib/s3-static-site-stack.js
scripts.deploy:serverless-demo: node setup aws-serverless-web-app && cd ../source/use_cases/aws-serverless-web-app && npx mira deploy serverless-web-app --file=lib/s3-static-site-stack.js && npx mira deploy serverless-web-app --file=lib/serverless-backend-stack.js
